description:
Whenever I meet a guy who is interested in doing a video, I always ask him why he is interested.
Ray is a college student and he's not from around here. He's trying to get enough money together to stay in school here so his parents won't make him move back home. He said that his motivation for wanting to stay is a beautiful girlfriend with a "hot bod".
Ray was really concerned about doing well in his first video and I had to spend a lot of time at first calming him down and getting him to relax. After he loosened up a bit, I got him talking about how he likes to fuck his girlfriend. That seemed to work.
Ray has beautiful blue eyes and even though he is straight I get the impression that he might be open to (ahem) other possibilities...
title: Ray
